title: Idaho Smokehouse Partners Recalls Ready-To-Eat Beef Stick Products Due to Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE: March 27, 2025 -- Details of this recall release were updated to reflect that the product may be packaged into larger plastic bags that bear the establishment number “V2059.” The packages were shipped to distribution centers in California, Illinois, Michigan, Minnesota, and Washington...

establishment.name: Idaho Smokehouse Partners LLC
activities: Identification - Meat;  Identification - Poultry;  Meat Processing;  Poultry Processing;  Voluntary Processing - Meat;  Voluntary Processing - Poultry;  Voluntary Processing - Rabbit

impacted_products: •	1.15-oz vacuum-sealed packages of “CHOMPS ORIGINAL BEEF STICK MILD,” with an expiration date of 02-10-2026, and lot code 25016 printed on the label. The product subject to recall bears establishment number “6220A” ink-jetted on the package.

•	13.8-oz plastic bags containing 12 1.15-oz vacuum-sealed packages of “CHOMPS ORIGINAL BEEF STICK MILD.” The plastic bags bear establishment number “V2059” and “LOT: 622025016,” with expiration date 02-10-2026 printed on the bags. The individual sticks h
